label: Dictionary form (plain)
notes: Base form (辞書形). Answer is the verb in dictionary form (hiragana-only grading).

label: Plain negative (ない-form)
notes: Informal present negative. Usually ends in ない (e.g., たべない / のまない).

label: Plain past (た-form)
notes: Informal past. Often called た-form (e.g., たべた / のんだ).

label: Plain past negative (なかった-form)
notes: Informal past negative. Typically ends in なかった (e.g., たべなかった / のまなかった).

label: Te-form (て-form)
notes: Te-form used for connections, requests, progressive, etc. Answer is the verb’s て/で form only.

label: Polite present (ます-form)
notes: Polite present affirmative. Often called ます-form (e.g., たべます / のみます).

label: Polite negative (ません-form)
notes: Polite present negative. Typically ends in ません (e.g., たべません / のみません).

label: Polite past (ました-form)
notes: Polite past affirmative. Typically ends in ました (e.g., たべました / のみました).

label: Polite past negative (ませんでした-form)
notes: Polite past negative. Typically ends in ませんでした (e.g., たべませんでした / のみませんでした).

label: Te-form (polite request: てください)
notes: Polite request pattern. Expected answer is: te-form + ください (e.g., たべてください).

label: Progressive/state (ている)
notes: Expected answer is: plain te-form + いる (e.g., たべている / のんでいる). Used for progressive actions and ongoing states.

label: Progressive/state polite (ています)
notes: Expected answer is: plain te-form + います (e.g., たべています / のんでいます).

label: Progressive/state polite negative (ていません)
notes: Expected answer is: plain te-form + いません (e.g., たべていません / のんでいません).

label: Progressive/state polite past (ていました)
notes: Expected answer is: plain te-form + いました (e.g., たべていました / のんでいました).

label: Progressive/state polite past negative (ていませんでした)
notes: Expected answer is: plain te-form + いませんでした (e.g., たべていませんでした / のんでいませんでした).

label: Desire (たい)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_tai).

label: Desire negative (たくない)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_tai_negative).

label: Desire past (たかった)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_tai_past).

label: Desire past negative (たくなかった)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_tai_past_negative).

label: Permission (てもいい)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_te_mo_ii).

label: Prohibition (てはいけない)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_te_wa_ikenai).

label: Negative request (ないでください)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_nai_de_kudasai).

label: Volitional (plain: よう／おう)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.plain_volitional).

label: Volitional polite (ましょう)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.polite_volitional).

label: Potential (can do)
notes: Expected answer is provided per-verb in verbs.v2.jsonl (new_conjugations.potential_plain).
